scripts.test: concurrently -k -s first -n server,test "npm run start:test-server" "npm run test:run"
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently -k -s first -n server,test "npm run start:test-server" "npm run test:run:coverage"
scripts.test:run: wait-on tcp:3001 && mkdir -p ../../test/report && npm run cucumber:exec && npm run test:finalize
scripts.test:run:coverage: wait-on tcp:3001 && mkdir -p ../../test/report && npm run cucumber:exec:coverage && npm run test:finalize
scripts.cucumber:exec:coverage: npx nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --report-dir=../../coverage npx cucumber-js -f json:../../test/report/api.json --require "stepDefinitions/*.js" features/$FEATURE_FILE
